clauses.title: Definitions
clauses.text: In this Schedule:

children.title: UK GDPR Terms
children.text: "Controller", "Processor", "Personal Data", "Processing", "Personal Data Breach", "Data Subject", and "Supervisory Authority" have the meanings given in the UK GDPR.

children.title: Services
children.text: "Services" has the meaning set out in the Terms.

children.title: Sub-processor
children.text: "Sub-processor" means any third party engaged by Voxd to process Personal Data on behalf of the Client.

clauses.title: Acknowledgement of Roles
clauses.text: The parties acknowledge that, for the purposes of the UK GDPR: the Client is the Controller of Personal Data processed in connection with the Services; and Voxd is the Processor, except where otherwise agreed in writing.

clauses.title: Processing on Instructions
clauses.text: Voxd shall process Personal Data only on documented instructions from the Client, including as set out in these Terms and this Schedule, unless required to do otherwise by applicable law.

clauses.title: Subject matter of processing
clauses.text: Provision of AI-powered chatbot configuration, integration, and related services.

clauses.title: Duration of processing
clauses.text: For the duration of the Services and any applicable retention period set out in these Terms or agreed in writing.

clauses.title: Nature and purpose of processing
clauses.text: Processing Personal Data as necessary to configure, operate, and support chatbot interactions and integrations as instructed by the Client.

clauses.title: Categories of Data Subjects
clauses.text: May include the Client's customers, prospective customers, employees, contractors, and other end users who interact with the chatbot.

clauses.title: Types of Personal Data
clauses.text: May include names, contact details, message content, identifiers, and any other Personal Data submitted by or on behalf of the Client through use of the Services.

clauses.title: Voxd's Obligations
clauses.text: Voxd shall:

children.title: Process on Instructions
children.text: process Personal Data only in accordance with the Client's documented instructions;

children.title: Confidentiality
children.text: ensure that persons authorised to process Personal Data are subject to confidentiality obligations;

children.title: Security Measures
children.text: implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect Personal Data against unauthorised or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage;

children.title: Personnel Reliability
children.text: take reasonable steps to ensure the reliability of personnel with access to Personal Data.

clauses.title: No Validation of Instructions
clauses.text: Voxd does not determine the purposes or means of processing and does not independently validate the lawfulness of the Client's instructions.

clauses.title: Authorisation
clauses.text: The Client authorises Voxd to engage Sub-processors for the provision of the Services, including hosting providers, infrastructure providers, and AI or messaging platform providers.

clauses.title: Sub-processor Obligations
clauses.text: Voxd shall ensure that any Sub-processor is subject to data protection obligations substantially similar to those set out in this Schedule.

clauses.title: Sub-processor List
clauses.text: A list of current Sub-processors may be made available by Voxd via the client portal or upon reasonable request.

clauses.title: Changes to Sub-processors
clauses.text: Voxd may add or replace Sub-processors from time to time. Where reasonably practicable, Voxd shall provide notice of material changes. Continued use of the Services constitutes acceptance of such changes.

clauses.title: Acknowledgement of Transfers
clauses.text: The Client acknowledges that Personal Data may be transferred to, stored, or processed outside the UK in connection with the Services, including by Sub-processors.

clauses.title: Transfer Safeguards
clauses.text: Voxd shall ensure that any such transfers are subject to appropriate safeguards in accordance with the UK GDPR, such as the UK International Data Transfer Agreement (IDTA) or other approved transfer mechanisms.

clauses.title: Security Measures
clauses.text: Voxd shall implement appropriate technical and organisational measures designed to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, taking into account the nature of the processing and the Services.

clauses.title: Examples of Measures
clauses.text: Such measures may include, where appropriate, access controls, encryption in transit, logical separation of environments, and incident response procedures.

clauses.title: No Absolute Security Guarantee
clauses.text: The Client acknowledges that no system is completely secure and that Voxd does not guarantee absolute security.

clauses.title: Breach Notification
clauses.text: Voxd shall notify the Client without undue delay after becoming aware of a Personal Data Breach affecting Personal Data processed on behalf of the Client.

clauses.title: Breach Assistance
clauses.text: Voxd shall provide reasonable assistance to enable the Client to comply with its notification obligations under the UK GDPR.

clauses.title: Scope of Assistance
clauses.text: Voxd shall provide reasonable assistance to the Client, taking into account the nature of the processing, in responding to: Data Subject rights requests; and regulatory inquiries or investigations relating to the processing.

clauses.title: Fees for Assistance
clauses.text: Voxd may charge reasonable fees for assistance that requires material effort or is outside the scope of the Services.

clauses.title: Deletion or Return on Termination
clauses.text: Upon termination or expiry of the Services, Voxd shall, at the Client's option and subject to applicable law, delete or return Personal Data processed on behalf of the Client.

clauses.title: Retention Exceptions
clauses.text: Voxd may retain Personal Data where required by law or for legitimate business purposes such as backups, audit logs, or dispute resolution, provided that such data remains subject to appropriate safeguards.

clauses.title: Right to Audit
clauses.text: The Client may, on reasonable written notice and no more than once in any twelve (12) month period, audit Voxd's compliance with this Schedule.

clauses.title: Audit Conditions
clauses.text: Audits shall be: limited to information reasonably necessary to demonstrate compliance; conducted during normal business hours; and subject to confidentiality obligations.

clauses.title: Alternative to Audit
clauses.text: Voxd may satisfy audit requests by providing relevant certifications, summaries, or third-party audit reports where available.

clauses.title: Liability Limitation
clauses.text: Each party's liability arising out of or in connection with this Schedule shall be subject to the limitations and exclusions of liability set out in the Terms.
